name: Taliskertasting

skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talisker tasting
des: We aim to enhance the whisky tasting experience at home, and this skill is intended replicate a guided tasting such as we offer at our distillery. Currently we have tasting experiences for Talisker 10 year old, Talisker Skye and Talisker Storm. This skill will provide a step by step audio guide to help you enjoy and appreciate the Talisker Whisky you are tasting, as well as learn about what it takes to make this award winning whisky. Impress friends with your new-found knowledge about the Talisker family.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
